snippet: The world snooker champion Ronnie O’Sullivan will not defend his title in May and will not play any professional matches for the rest of this season.
abstract: World snooker champion Ronnie O’Sullivan will not defend his title in May and will not play any professional matches for rest of season because of personal issues.
lead_paragraph: The world snooker champion Ronnie O’Sullivan will not defend his title in May and will not play any professional matches for the rest of this season.

headline.seo: Snooker World Champion Ronnie O’Sullivan Out for Year
headline.main: Snooker World Champion Out for the Year
